mapper.insert: insert into LY_ACTIONS_EXEC_TBL (UID_ACTIVIDAD, ACC_EXECUTION_UID, TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, ACTION_UID, MANUAL_EXECUTION, START_DATE, END_DATE, USER_ID, STATUS_ID, STATUS_TEXT) values (#{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:

ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{record.accExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{accExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
